trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中儲存格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項可讓您完全自訂其外觀，包括標頭資料格的框線。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性可讓您設定的儲存格框線外觀。

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您需要進一步自訂框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>類別可讓您設定在個別的資料格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>分別代表左、 右、 上框線和下框線的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定這些屬性上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>來產生不同的儲存格之間的框線外觀。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adjusts the cell borders of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> so that a double border separates the interior cells and the top left header cell from the row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會調整的儲存格框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，以便從資料列和資料行標頭框線為雙線分隔內部的資料格和左上方的標題儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A>方法，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: These members use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> objects to modify individual cell borders.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>物件，以修改個別資料格框線。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之所有框線的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>屬性未設定為相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時所指定的值並非有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> and this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> instance was retrieved through the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時所指定的值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" />，而且這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> 執行個體是經由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> 屬性來擷取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格下框線的樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時所指定的值並非有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be compared.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> and the values for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> properties are equal to their counterpart in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="other" /> 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> 屬性的值等於目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> 中的對等值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 做為特定型別的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the left border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格左框線的樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時所指定的值並非有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" /> and this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> instance has an associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時所指定的值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />，而且這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> 執行個體具有關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the right border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格右框線的樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時所指定的值並非有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />。

The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" /> and this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> instance has an associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時所指定的值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />，而且這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> 執行個體具有關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前執行個體複本的新物件。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ICloneable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the top border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格上框線的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> 的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> 的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A>方法會傳回包含之值的字串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>屬性。
